author: Jj Nattrass
title: Lisa Appleton flashes her ample assets in skimpy gym wear | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 86 shares Taking care to stretch her limbs before undertaking any strenuous exercises, the Cheshire-born reality star threw herself into some strenuous lunges. Possibly inspired by DC's iconic super heroine Wonder Woman, Lisa went for a flesh-flashing athletic ensemble - a red top and blue hotpants. A real stretch! Clearly wanting to focus on keeping up her fitness in the long winter months, the 48-year-old reality personality wasn't shy about flexing her muscles by the beach Her skimpy choice in sports bra was almost Lisa's downfall, as her ample cleavage threatened to escape the constricting garments confines. Flashing her pink lacy bra as she poses and stretched, the Big Brother Nine star's top seemingly struggled to cope with Lisa's enegetic activity. Ever the picture of confidence, Lisa proudly flaunted her figure by teaming the sports bra with a pair of tiny sky blue hot pants. Saucy and sporty? Her skimpy choice in sports wear saw Lisa flashing plenty of flesh, donning an extremely tight red top and tiny blue hotpants She rounded her sporty workout kit off with a red belt around the mid-riff and a pair of white trainers; she also sported a multitude of bracelets on her arms. Wearing her long brown locks swept back off of her face with an alice band and tumbling down her back, Lisa was sure not to let her hair get in the way as she worked out. Lisa previously revealed that she would be undergoing a host of beauty treatments to stop her 'looking like a testicle.' In a bid to combat her worst fears, Lisa has a number of non-surgical treatments lined up - including a face lift, and lip and cheek fillers. Keeping in top condition? Lisa previously revealed that she would be undergoing a host of beauty treatments to stop her 'looking like a testicle' She told OK! Online : 'If you want to let yourself go and look like a testicle then go for it, but I don't want to look a testicle, thanks. 'I want to look young again and it's possible to reverse some of the ageing.' Part of her bid to stop the ageing process could also be down to the fact that she attracts younger men. The reality star made the confession on Lizzie Cundy's Fubar radio show, revealing: 'I've had a few toy boys, I attract them all in. 'I think they like the older, experienced woman who can put them in their place.' She added that older men were not for her as 'they wouldn't be able to keep up with me.' Strong views: She told OK! Online : 'If you want to let yourself go and look like a testicle then go for it, but I don't want to look a testicle, thanks' Read more: Share or comment on this article 86
